title: Aaha Kalyanam
story: An ambitious Mahalaxmis life takes a U-turn when she is forced to marry Surya, a businessman. Stark opposites in nature, will love bloom between the couple?

title: siragadikka aasai
story: Circumstances force Meena, a family-centric girl, to marry Muthu, a thug. Willthis unfortunate marriage turn into love?

title: thamizhum saraswathiyum
story: Saraswathi, a dropout, falls in love with an uneducated Thamizh, and they tie the knot. Now she has to prove herself and win over her husbands family.

title: Pandian Stores 2
story: Pandians life revolves around his big family. When his children get entangled with rivals, will their strong family bonds endure destinys trials?

title: Ponni
story: Ponni, a simple girl faces many hardships in life until she meets Sakthivel. When circumstances bring them together under one roof, will they find love?

title: Modhalum Kaadhalum
story: Vikram loves his daughter Tanvika, but fails to express himself. Vedha adores the kid, which makes him envy her. Can Tanvika bring these lonely hearts closer?

title: Eeramaana Rojaavey 2
story: Kavya and Jeevas love story takes a hit when destiny forces them to marry each others elder siblings. How will these complicated relationship work?

title: Baakiyalakshmi
story: When Baakiyalakshmi embarks on a journey to find her identity after divorce, she is weighed down by new responsiblities. Can she successfully forge her own path?

title: Muthazhagu
story: When village head Pechiammal stops dauntless Muthazhagus marriage twice, she is forced to marry her sophisticated son. Will this odd couple stay together?

title: Chellamma
story: Unfortunate events bring Chellamma and Malar to Lakshmis doorstep, unaware of their past connection. As the truth unfolds, will it be a safe haven for them?

title: Thendral Vanthu Ennai Thodum
story: After being separated for years, Abhi and Vetri cross paths again. When destiny offers a second chance to the couple, will history repeat itself?

title: Kaatrukkena Veli
story: Vennila leaves her wedding alter to pursue her dreams. Her path becomes challenging when she meets Surya, who hates his mother for choosing her career over him.

title: Ponmagal Vanthaal
story: Rohini signs a contractual marriage with Gowtham for the well-being of her family. Will the two eventually fall in love and fight to save their marriage?

title: Nenjam Marapathillai
story: Circumstances force Vikkram to marry Saranya, but he is in love with Sathya. What will happen when saranya finds out the truth?

title: Kalyamam Kalyanam
story: While Kamali belives in the institution of marriage, Soorya is against it. But circumstances force them to ge married. Will theur story have a happy ending?

title: Kizhakku Vasal
story: Renuka, the adopted daughter of the patriarch Samiyappan, strives for acceptance and love while battling forces that threaten their extended familys unity.

title: Ponnuku thanga manasu
story: Are good qualities enough to be considered a good daughter-in law? Newlyweds Divya and Prasanth face multiple challenges thrown by his greedy mother for dowry.

title: Saravanan Meenatchi
story: He is a middle-class boy. She is a rich girl. Despite the differences in their families, will Saravanan and Meenatchi lead happy life together?

title: Anbuden Kushi
story: Born in a conservative family, an ambitious Kushi is married off to a middle-class boy, Anbudan. Will he support Kushi and give wings to her dreams?

title: Mahanadhi
story: Tradegy befalls a happy middle-class family after their father Saravanans sudden demise. Now, his daughters must find hope while overcoming the conflicts in life.
